effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases happiness by 10/5/2.  Lowers Defense effort by 10.
effect_entries.short_effect: Drops Defense Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケモンに　あげると
とても　なつき　やすくなるが
防御の　基礎ポイントは　さがる。

A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon.
Using it on a Pokémon makes it more
friendly but lowers its base Defense.

Usata su un Pokémon, lo rende più amichevole,
ma ne diminuisce i punti base della Difesa.

Si la lleva un Pokémon, debilita un ataque
supereficaz de tipo Hielo de un enemigo.

Isst ein Pokémon diese Beere, stärkt dies
eure Freundschaft, verringert aber seinen
Verteidigungs-Basiswert.

Une Baie qui rend les Pokémon plus amicaux,
mais baisse leur Défense de base.

포켓몬에게 주면
매우 친밀해지기 쉬워지지만
방어의 기초 포인트가 떨어진다.

ポケモンに　あげると
とても　なつき　やすくなるが
ぼうぎょの　きそポイントは　さがる。

Using it on a Pokémon makes it more
friendly, but it also lowers its base
Defense stat.

Using it on a Pokémon makes it more
friendly, but it also lowers its base
Defense stat.

Rend les Pokémon plus amicaux, mais
baisse leur stat Défense de base.

Using it on a Pokémon makes it more
friendly, but it also lowers its base
Defense stat.

A Poffin ingredient. Using it on a
Pokémon makes it more friendly, but
it also lowers its base Defense stat.

A Poffin ingredient. Using it on a
Pokémon makes it more friendly, but
it also lowers its base Defense stat.

Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.

Makes a POKéMON
friendly but lowers
base DEFENSE.

POKéBLOCK ingredient.
Plant in loamy soil
to grow QUALOT.
